title: Mobile-Based Remote Education Competency Enhancement Program: Digital Skill Development for Social Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage and internet search proficiency
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning using mobile apps and low-bandwidth content in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, requiring flexible structures compatible with learners' daily routines (e.g., childcare, work)

learning_goals: Learners can independently complete 15-minute microlearning modules three times per week via a mobile platform
Learners can collaborate with peers on project assignments using remote collaboration tools (e.g., KakaoTalk Open Chat, Google Docs)
Learners can plan and execute projects to solve real workplace problems by applying learned digital skills (e.g., remote task management, online communication)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
